SEARCH
Module org.neo4j.cypherdsl.core
Package org.neo4j.cypherdsl.core.renderer

Interface GeneralizedRenderer

All Superinterfaces:
Renderer
@API(status=STABLE, since="2023.1.0") public sealed interface GeneralizedRenderer extends Renderer
This is a more general renderer than Renderer. The generalized renderer will render any Visitable. This renderer will not cache rendered results for visitables.
Since:
2023.1.0
Author:
Michael J. Simons

  • Method Details

    • render

      String render(Visitable visitable)
      Renders any Visitable.
      Parameters:
      visitable - the visitable to render
      Returns:
      a Cypher fragment (in case of arbitrary visitables), a full statement in case a Statement was passed to the renderer.
